targets.expr: sum(kube_node_info{node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes", cluster="$cluster"})

sum (max by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes"}) * on(namespace, pod) group_left() max by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1)) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="cpu",cluster="$cluster", node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes"})

sum (max by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes"}) * on(namespace, pod) group_left() max by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1)) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="memory",cluster="$cluster", node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes"})

sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="cpu",cluster="$cluster", node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes"}) - sum (max by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes"}) * on(namespace, pod) group_left() max by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1))

panels.description: Free Nodes in Default Pool for RAM, CPU and Spare Nodes (safely removable from the cluster)

targets.expr: (sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="cpu",cluster="$cluster", node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes"}) - sum (max by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes"}) * on(namespace, pod) group_left() max by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1)))/max(kube_node_status_capacity{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="cpu",cluster="$cluster", node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes"})

(sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="memory",cluster="$cluster", node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes"}) - sum (max by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes"}) * on(namespace, pod) group_left() max by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1)))/max(kube_node_status_capacity{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="memory",cluster="$cluster", node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes"})

panels.title: Free Nodes Default

targets.expr: sum(max by (namespace, pod, container, cluster) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes"}) * on(namespace, pod, cluster) group_left() max by (namespace, pod, cluster) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1)) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="cpu",cluster="$cluster", node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes"})

sum(max by (namespace, pod, container, cluster) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory",job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes"}) * on(namespace, pod, cluster) group_left() max by (namespace, pod, cluster) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1)) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="memory",cluster="$cluster", node!~"$autoscaler", node!~"$sip_nodes", node!~"$rtp_nodes"})
sum(kube_node_info{node=~"$autoscaler", cluster="$cluster"})

sum (max by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"}) * on(namespace, pod) group_left() max by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1)) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="cpu",cluster="$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"})

sum (max by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",job="kube-state-metrics", cluster=~"$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"}) * on(namespace, pod) group_left() max by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1)) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="memory",cluster="$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"})

sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="cpu",cluster="$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"}) - sum (max by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"}) * on(namespace, pod) group_left() max by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1))

panels.description: Free Nodes in Autoscaler Pool for RAM, CPU and Spare Nodes (safely removable from the cluster)

targets.expr: (sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="cpu",cluster="$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"}) - sum (max by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"}) * on(namespace, pod) group_left() max by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1)))/max(kube_node_status_capacity{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="cpu",cluster="$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"})

(sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="memory",cluster="$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"}) - sum (max by (namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"}) * on(namespace, pod) group_left() max by (namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1)))/max(kube_node_status_capacity{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="memory",cluster="$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"})

panels.title: Free Nodes Autoscaler

targets.expr: sum(max by (namespace, pod, container, cluster) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"}) * on(namespace, pod, cluster) group_left() max by (namespace, pod, cluster) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1)) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="cpu",cluster="$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"})

sum(max by (namespace, pod, container, cluster) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory",job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"}) * on(namespace, pod, cluster) group_left() max by (namespace, pod, cluster) (kube_pod_status_phase{phase=~"Pending|Running"} == 1)) / sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="kube-state-metrics",resource="memory",cluster="$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"})

panels.description: CPU usage and resources per Namespace

targets.expr: sum(kube_pod_owner{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster"}) by (namespace)
count(avg(namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster"}) by (workload, namespace)) by (namespace)
sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster"}) by (namespace)
sum(namespace_cpu:kube_pod_container_resource_requests:sum{cluster="$cluster"}) by (namespace)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster"}) by (namespace) / sum(namespace_cpu:kube_pod_container_resource_requests:sum{cluster="$cluster"}) by (namespace)
sum(namespace_cpu:kube_pod_container_resource_limits:sum{cluster="$cluster"}) by (namespace)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster"}) by (namespace) / sum(namespace_cpu:kube_pod_container_resource_limits:sum{cluster="$cluster"}) by (namespace)

panels.title: CPU / Namespace

panels.description: Memory usage and resources per Namespace

targets.expr: sum(kube_pod_owner{job="kube-state-metrics", cluster="$cluster"}) by (namespace)
count(avg(namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{cluster="$cluster"}) by (workload, namespace)) by (namespace)
sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", container!=""}) by (namespace)
sum(namespace_memory:kube_pod_container_resource_requests:sum{cluster="$cluster"}) by (namespace)

sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", container!=""}) by (namespace) / sum(namespace_memory:kube_pod_container_resource_requests:sum{cluster="$cluster"}) by (namespace)
sum(namespace_memory:kube_pod_container_resource_limits:sum{cluster="$cluster"}) by (namespace)

sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", container!=""}) by (namespace) / sum(namespace_memory:kube_pod_container_resource_limits:sum{cluster="$cluster"}) by (namespace)

panels.title: Memory / Namespace

targets.expr: sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster", node!="$autoscaler"}) by (namespace)
sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate{cluster="$cluster", node=~"$autoscaler"}) by (namespace)
sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", container!="", node!="$autoscaler"}) by (namespace)
sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", container!="", node=~"$autoscaler"}) by (namespace)

list.definition: label_values(kube_node_spec_taint{ key="node-role.cognigy.ai", effect="NoSchedule", value="autoscaler", cluster="$cluster"}, node)
list.label: autoscaler
list.name: autoscaler

query.query: label_values(kube_node_spec_taint{ key="node-role.cognigy.ai", effect="NoSchedule", value="autoscaler", cluster="$cluster"}, node)
